column1: syntax; bbvX.YZ.AB
X.YZ: this is the version of the skimmer, just copy it from there
AB; version of the Analyzer. With each time you run the analyzer on condor increase this number by 1 and write the edit comments
Once you have pushed the code to repository
create a new tag using:
git tag bbv0.00.01
push the new tag using:
git push origin bbv0.00.01
bbv0.00.01; keeping this as the base tag; changes for the tau veto discriminator are done
bbvXX.YY.01: * configured for year 2018: condor submission
bbvXX.YY.02: * added the met phi and recoil phi variables
bbv04.00.00: * added prefiring weights for 2017 and 2016
bbv06.00.00: * made the analyser for prefiring weight for all eras and added event counter histogram
bbv06.02.00: * added the Type1smear met
bbv06.02.01: * factorised the cutflow, and added the boolean for each CR
bbv06.02.02: * applied tightID sf to subleading electron if it passes tightID
bbv06.04.00: * adding Hem Veto
bbv06.04.01: * removed HEM veto from analyser

column2: * added hemisphere variables for SR1 and SR2

column1: bbv06.04.02: * no trigger applied on MC

column3: * added ratioJet21, dPhiJet12 and dEtaJet12 variables

column1: bbv06.04.03: * PU sf issue fixed & met trig for 2016
bbv06.04.04 * updated PU MC file and few new variables
bbv06.04.05 * updated the hemisphere variables

column2: * update the btag out of bound weights

column1: bbv06.05.00 * added calo met variables
bbv06.05.01 * adding the delta(metPhi, lep phi)

column2: * added a jet count for jeteta < 4.5

column1: bbv07.00.00 * shifting back to st_pfMetCorrPt

column4: *fixing bbv06.05.01 issue of not properly selecting the jets with abs(jet eta) < 2.5

bbv07.02.00 * added functionality to run on single file\

column4: * change the name of configs directory
* included the PUjetID but not applied
